effect.short: Blocks damaging attacks and lowers attacking Pokémon's Attack by two stages on contact.  Switches Aegislash to Shield Forme.
effect.full: Blocks damaging attacks and lowers attacking Pokémon's Attack by two stages on contact.  Switches Aegislash to Shield Forme.

flavorTexts.text:
The user takes a defensive stance while it protects
itself from damage. It also harshly lowers the Attack
stat of any attacker who makes direct contact.
